forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before 2pm. Partly sunny, with a high near 78. South southwest wind around 16 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms between 8pm and 2am, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. Low around 57, with temperatures rising to around 64 overnight. Southwest wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
